scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev -w @tres/api" "npm run dev -w @tres/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @tres/api && npm run build -w @tres/web
scripts.deploy:web:cf: npm run build -w @tres/web && npx wrangler pages deploy apps/web/out --project-name=tres-finos --branch=main --commit-dirty=true
scripts.deploy:cf: npm run deploy:api:cf && npm run deploy:web:cf
